website_summaries.verdict: The Timberland Groveton Plain-Toe Chukka is a kind of Timberland mid-top shoe that one could casually rock anywhere from the streets to any urban adventure. The clean-looking upper with a plain toe offers versatility, which makes it an easy pair to either dress up or dress down. Although sizing is limited to regular widths, many were pleased that this shoe fits excellent and true to size. It is stylish and of great value, without giving up comfort and functionality.
pros: The majority of reviewers highly recommend the Timberland Groveton Plain-Toe Chukka Shoes because of their overall performance
Heaps of wearers agreed that this mid-top sneaker fits true to size both in length and width
Several reviewers commented that this Timberland shoe had gotten them lots of compliments and inquiries
This hiking-inspired kick is very comfortable when worn, claimed by many wearers
Some users appreciated how sturdy this shoe is
The quality is impressive, according to them
Many buyers loved that the Groveton Plain-Toe Chukka Shoes are stylish and can easily be dressed up or down
This shoe has excellent ankle support, according to some reviewers
A few purchasers commented that this Timberland mid-top is lightweight
cons: Some reviewers stated that some colors of the Timberland Groveton Plain-Toe Chukka is lighter than shown in the photos
A couple of reviewers expressed a bit of disappointment that this shoe is not available in wide widths
Some reviewers pointed out that this would be easier to put on if a heel pull tab is added

customer_reviews.title: Do not hold up to use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and comfortable. But they literally suck moisture out of your feet and get wet. They stay "wet" from the inside for a long time. My hubby wore these for 4 hours yesterday just sitting at a racetrack and this is what they still look like 8 hours after taking them off
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Chuc

customer_reviews.title: he says they are very comfortable. It is a very nice looking shoe/boot
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son for Christmas and he loves them, he says they are very comfortable. It is a very nice looking shoe/boot, but the suede part of the shoe does not clean up well. My son got a black spot on it and I bought their dry clean kit hoping it would clean it off, but it did not.
customer_reviews.author: amyjuz

customer_reviews.title: I like this shoes very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoes very much, they're confortable. But I went out the other night and the next day they were like this. Anyone knows how can I clean them and protect them to prevent this happening again?
customer_reviews.author: Agustín Silva Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My shoes just arrived and I am wearing them already. They seem to be of good quality and look styling. They fit as expected. The company even shipped them priority, which I appreciate. Thank you. I will update down the road if they happen to degrade prematurely or anything.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but you have to be lucky with size.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but not true to size. I have size 10. Received size 10b which it felt like size 11. Exchanged tI size 9 and it was fine by length but way too narrow. Exchanged to size 9.5. Perfect fit. Finally. Thanks Amazon for easy return exchange process.
customer_reviews.author: AndreMat

customer_reviews.title: Fit, quality, style and price on the button!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome shoes. I already had them in black and the tan are Timberland signatures.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Locklear

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these for painting indoors. He has issues with his feet and back and they are comfortable for him to be in all day. Plus they give a little support around the ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Faysal

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES AT A GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: These Timberland's are great, they fit perfectly, and have a cool style to them. If you go to a mall the same exact shoe will cost you much more. If your looking for some great Tim's do yourself a favor and pick up a pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Troupis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes! Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes! Very impressed. Fits as expected. Leather and cloth mix, and just a very nice dress boot or just everyday wearing.
customer_reviews.author: naveah

customer_reviews.title: Good boots, so-so durability
customer_reviews.text: I have had these boots for about 18 months now. I wore them almost every day when I first got them and love the look and fit. Within a year, the leather separated from the sole on the outside of my left boot. I wear them every once in a while because I still like them, but I'm disappointed because I expected Timberland boots to be more durable than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable Shoe/Boot
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend. They fit as expected and he loves them! He is able to wear them in snow and says they feel durable and more like a boot but without the look of a boot. The black color looks sleek and they look nice on.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these without reading the reviews or taking a closer look at them. The box seemed legit, but the sole was completely off and the tag says made in Cambodia. All timbs are made in the Dominican Republic, and the sticthing was completely off

customer_reviews.title: Stylish look, comfort, fast shipping directly to the college dorm

customer_reviews.title: and made my sons heel bleed terribly.. he is a size 11 and these ...
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t fit right.. and made my sons heel bleed terribly.. he is a size 11 and these just fit funky. When he took his shoe off sock was soaked in blood and ruined the inside of the shoe.. maybe we just got the pair that had a quirky heel..he was really excited about them too.. :( o-well we won’t buy shoes off amazon again.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: First day owning them. They look well designed and well built. It's awesome they use recycled materials as the design and build is solid. Of course they will take time to break in. Runs a little large. I don't want to buy any other shoe then these timberlands. If I could have a lifetime supply yeah that be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart Already!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 4 months ago, only started wearing them a little over 4 weeks ago, just look at them now. It's not like I go mountain climbing or running in these shoes, I do less than an hour a day of walking at most. I've bought these before, same make and size, and they lasted well over a year for me, but this time they held together for only a couple of weeks. I don't know if Timberland have cut down on their quality, or the seller I got it from sold me some cheap knockoffs. Either way I paid $89.95 for absolute garbage I can no longer return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but buy a half size lower!
customer_reviews.text: Quality feels nice for the price. However I would reccomend buying a half size smaller. I'm a 10.5 but these in 10.5 feel like there's a lot of room where there shouldn't be and make them a slight pain. I'm sure I'll get used to them but would highly recommend buying a half size lower to save yourself the trouble

customer_reviews.title: Durable yet light Timbs!
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint that I have with these shoes is that they are flat which can easily be corrected with some Dr. Schols! Other than that! I love them! They are light, durable, and water resistant! Most people cant even tell that they are Timberland! I highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE NOT AUTHENTIC TIMBERLAND SHOES
customer_reviews.text: Well, the shoes are not bad. However, they are knock-off's. The box they came in is damaged(one of the biggest signs they are fake), there are imperfections in the stitching, glue is showing around the the whole shoe, even the logo is a little off, most of all there is a huge imperfection on the back of one of the shoes. It is obviously damaged.. I clearly asked the seller if they were authentic Timberland brand shoes and he gave me vague answers that did NOT answer my yes-or-no questions. I now know why. THESE ARE NOT AUTHENTIC TIMBERLAND SHOES!!! Look up how to tell if you have knock-off Timberland shoes.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Too much glue
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived quickly and in good condition. There was slight glue damage around some of the edges. It wasn't too noticeable but still disappointing. It was for a birthday gift so I didn't return them because I did not have time. They fit perfect though.

product_meta.title: Timberland Ek Groveton Fl Chk, Men’s Lace Up Shoes
product_meta.description: Plain toe chukka leather and fabric
feature_bullets: Sneaker-inspired chukka boot featuring lace-up closure with padded top collar
Ortholite pu footbed made from 5% recycled rubber provides all-day cushioning and support
Unique L7 lug design features multi-directional leading edges with beveled lug sidewalls that allow for self-cleaning and superior traction on a variety of surfaces
